otherBenefits.name: Accidental loss or Damage to Home Electronic Appliances
otherBenefits.coverageLimit:
Coverage Amount : SGD 2,500

Accidental loss or damage to Home Electronic Appliances such as:
1. Kitchen appliances: refrigerator, freezer, dishwasher, microwave oven, cooker hood and hob
2. Home appliances: television, audio equipment, air-conditioner, washer/dryer
3. Personal appliance: tablets, laptops, computers
(Excess: SGD 100)
